title: SOLD N172: Old Judge: Long John Reilly & Standing Bat Paul Hines
author: shernan30

posts.post_title: SOLD N172: Old Judge: Long John Reilly & Standing Bat Paul Hines
posts.post_content:
My wife has some grand Christmas ideas so I'm giving in and selling a few cards to treat her. 

First up for grabs is "Long John" Reilly. The card has a nice image and a pretty neat stamp in the back from, more the likely, the original owner.
I'm asking SOLD dlvd.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=587&pictureid=16805[/IMG]  [IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=587&pictureid=16806[/IMG]

Second is one of the few Standing Bat poses in the N172 set. Paul Hines of the Washington Nationals has a great image with a clean back. This was purchased this summer at National and has be proudly displayed as one of the few OJs I have that are not a part of my Columbus Solons set.
Asking price is SOLD dlvd.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=587&pictureid=16807[/IMG]  [IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=587&pictureid=16808[/IMG]

If you are interested PM or email, [url]shernan30@gmail.com[/url].

Thanks for looking, 

Steven
